channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024051757
item.description:
Report X-2024051757

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-28
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PKG MISSING REQUIRED HAZMAT CERTIFICATION, OP-900LL HAZMAT TAGS, AND MARKINGS FOR A PKG CONTAINING PAINT. 90% OF LTD QTY DIAMOND COVERED BY SHIPPER'S BARCODE. FRICTION LID WITH NO CLIPS FAILED ALLOWING PAINT TO LEAK WETTING AND COATING THE CONTENTS AND CARTON.

item.title: Report X-2024051683
item.description:

  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
